MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.51pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.40pm on Thursday 14th January 2021.
